CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Low-band-gap polymers for bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) have been studied intensively with the aim of matching a greater part of the solar spectrum and thus harvesting more photon flux , to produce efficiencies greater than 7-9 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Low-band-gap polymers |
| BHJ-type polymer solar cells (PSCs) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Low-band-gap polymers |
| PSCs |

The entity "BHJ-type polymer solar cells (PSCs)" is not included in the table as it is not a material name, but rather a description of a type of solar cell.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Low-band-gap polymers for bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) have been studied intensively with the aim of matching a greater part of the solar spectrum and thus harvesting more photon flux , to produce efficiencies greater than 7-9 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low-band-gap polymers |
| bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells (PSCs) |
| solar spectrum |
| photon flux |
| efficiencies |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low-band-gap polymers |
| efficiencies |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells (PSCs)" - This entity refers to a specific type of solar cell, not a material property.
* "solar spectrum" - This entity refers to the distribution of solar radiation, not a material property.
* "photon flux" - This entity refers to the amount of light that passes through a given area, not a material property.
